content:
Hello @everyone, let me advertise this poll here for a birthday meetup we're organizing for March 23rd (next Tuesday).
If you'd like to have an informal chat with people here, vote!
The server is turning 1 next week! We're getting together for a social video call and everyone is invited.
Right, it's not my birthday :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:

We will use GatherTown, a better kind of video meeting where we can walk around in a nice space and socialize like we normally would. We're going to meet in https://gather.town/app/Wey6FRUZhwzTYxgO/CT%20Zulip%201st%20Birthday tomorrow @ 8am UTC and/or 4pm UTC. So you have a morning and evening option. Hope to see you there!
I'm looking forward to this, see you in half an hour or so
I definitely won't have time to join, after all this preparation... I already had to cancel a 2 hour meeting today because I didn't have time for it, nor have I had time to go outside for a walk...
This term isn't quite done with me yet
The second time will start in five minutes. Hope you can join.

Christian Williams said:

We will use GatherTown, a better kind of video meeting where we can walk around in a nice space and socialize like we normally would. We're going to meet in https://gather.town/app/Wey6FRUZhwzTYxgO/CT%20Zulip%201st%20Birthday tomorrow @ 8am UTC and/or 4pm UTC. So you have a morning and evening option. Hope to see you there!
If you have trouble with Firefox, you can try Chrome.
it was great! thanks for coming. hope we do this more often. Screenshot-from-2021-03-23-09-19-14.png
In the end I forgot to even double check the times in case I was awake and free to pop in :-)
